recipesJson.name: Banoffee Cookie (DMC Challenge)
recipesJson.author: mlNikon
recipesJson.description: Banana and toffee cookie with a touch of cinnamon. This is for the Diy Mixers Crew cinnamon challenge. I don't really like heavy cinnamon recipes but this offers just a nice touch of cinnamon to compliment the toffee and banana cookie. Decent right away but really shines in a week or two.
